argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | phlsrng.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | phllmhm.h | |- ., = ( .i ` W ) |
| 3 |  | phllmhm.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ipcl.f | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) = ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2, 3, 5 | #P_phllmhm | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ B e. V ) -> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_rlmbas | |- ( Base ` F ) = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` F ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 7 | #P_eqtri | |- K = ( Base ` ( ringLMod ` F ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_lmhmf | |- ( ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) e. ( W LMHom ( ringLMod ` F ) ) -> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) : V --> K ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ B e. V ) -> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) : V --> K ) |
| 11 | 5 | #P_fmpt | |- ( A. x e. V ( x ., B ) e. K <-> ( x e. V |-> ( x ., B ) ) : V --> K ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ B e. V ) -> A. x e. V ( x ., B ) e. K ) |
| 13 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( x = A -> ( x ., B ) = ( A ., B ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( x = A -> ( ( x ., B ) e. K <-> ( A ., B ) e. K ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_rspccva | |- ( ( A. x e. V ( x ., B ) e. K /\ A e. V ) -> ( A ., B ) e. K ) |
| 16 | 12, 15 | #P_stoic3 | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ B e. V /\ A e. V ) -> ( A ., B ) e. K ) |
| 17 | 16 | #P_3com23 | |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ A e. V /\ B e. V ) -> ( A ., B ) e. K ) |
